response.overview: Nadia, a Singaporean expatriate living in luxury in Jeddah with her successful husband, faces an awakening following her parents' visit in Saudi and her father Aziz's sudden death. Distanced from her simple roots, Nadia is presented to the idea of performing the Hajj pilgrimage in his place, while she has other priorities instead - her lavish lifestyle. Nadia, yang menetap dan hidup mewah di Jeddah bersama suaminya yang berjaya, menghadapi masalah setelah lawatan ibu bapanya di Saudi dan kematian mengejut bapanya Aziz. Nadia menimbangkan usulan untuk menemani ibunya menunaikan haji tatkala dia mempunyai keutamaan lain - gaya hidupnya yang mewah, berbeza dengan kehidupannya yang sederhana dahulu.
response.title: Bisikan Syahdu
